case.title: Drink tonight in Central London ? - 38 (West End & Near)
case.text:
Hello,
It's been a busy week and I'd love to have a wind down drink or two this evening, though preferably not talking shop with colleagues. So if you've got a few hours free and would fancy a bit of conversation, it would be great to hear from you.
You'd be meeting a 38 year old professional guy, 6ft tall, slim, sane, single and solvent.
